name: Beast's Domain
description:
An ancient tribe rumoured to have been in existence since the creation of the world has been tasked to keep the natural order for generations. A tradition was formed: track down beasts that come from another world and return them to their rightful place. The challenge does not require the child to kill the monster but does require that the monster no longer exists in their realm. After being granted the magic-infused talisman, Fiowek sets off on a journey to bring back balance to the world and learn of their heritage. The Game

A boss-rush style game. In Beast’s Domain, you control Fiowek, a child accomplishing their rite of passage by using the environment to drive monsters away from their world.

Figure out the monsters’ patterns and behaviours to best contest it, leading it to be trapped or defeated. Then, cast a spell to send the monster back to its home dimension!

Specifications

The game is controlled with a PS4 or Xbox controller, to be played on Mac and Windows OS, made with Unity.
